response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a fair deal while also maximizing the return on my investment. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
